aircraft.value: Pegasus Swift - AC-1253-831 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 08/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 09/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 12/12/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 15/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 16/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
